easy.q: I have a face and two hands, but no arms or legs. I’m not alive, but I tell you the time. What am I?
easy.hint: Look at where you see numbers and hands moving.

medium.q: I’m a word of letters three; add two, and fewer there will be. What word am I?
medium.hint: Think about how adding letters can change meaning.

hard.q: Two people stand on a shore with a rope between them. Each pulls with equal force, yet the rope stays still. Why?
hard.a: Because they pull in opposite directions with the same strength, balancing the force.
